definition: clique/school/group/faction/to dispatch/to send/to assign/to appoint/pi (Greek letter Ππ)/the circular ratio pi = 3.1415926/(loanword) pie
variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: Paiko threw himself into the back of the Land Rover, banging his head against the hard metal.
sentences.chinese: 派克将自己扔到陆虎后车厢里，头倚着硬硬的铁皮。

sentences.english: Pike put me on to the Department's Legal Section.
sentences.chinese: 派克将我的注意力吸引到该局的法律部。

sentences.english: I've meandered now from the downtown ferry terminal up to the Pike Place Public Market.
sentences.chinese: 我从渡船停靠的渡口一直漫步到派克公共市场。

sentences.english: Tell her to frown a little more when Sparks dances.
sentences.chinese: 告诉她在斯派克斯跳舞的时候，眉头再皱紧一些。

sentences.english: He occupies a three-story dwelling place on the Park Street.
sentences.chinese: 他在派克街上有一幢3层楼的寓所。

sentences.english: Packer has tabled five amendments to the bill, drawn up with the help of the society.
sentences.chinese: 儿童协会帮助派克对福利改革法案提出了五项修正。

sentences.english: Mr. Pak and Su-mi go into the store.
sentences.chinese: 派克先生和苏米走进了商店。

sentences.english: Can you tell me the way to Parkson Street , please?
sentences.chinese: 您能告诉我去派克森街怎么走吗？

sentences.english: "We'll defend the Wall to the last man, " said Cotter Pyke.
sentences.chinese: “我们会坚守长城到剩最后一个人”卡特派克说道。

sentences.english: Robert Parker says this wine is comparable with a Grand Cru Classe.
sentences.chinese: 酒评人派克指，此酒的质素可媲美特级酒。
派克疑惑着眉毛拱了起来。

sentences.english: Parker was an orphan, no one would miss him.
sentences.chinese: 而派克只是个孤儿，没人会想念他。

sentences.english: "Material evidence" of the ancient images at Mexico's Bonampak site?
sentences.chinese: 在墨西哥远古的波拿蒙派克遗址的“物证”照片？

sentences.english: Mr. Parker was a lord whom everyone looked up to.
sentences.chinese: 派克先生是个人人都尊敬的贵族。

sentences.english: My carry-on item was a parka.
sentences.chinese: 我还携带了一件派克式的外套。

sentences.english: Mike stole a Parker pen from a classmate.
sentences.chinese: 麦克偷了同学的一支派克笔。

definition: Werther, opera by Jules Massenet/Werther, German masculine given name
